record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2734
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2734 -- (Senate - March 10, 2008)

[Page: S1785]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, S. 2734 is at the desk and due for its second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the bill by title for the second time.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2734) to aid families and neighborhoods facing home foreclosure and address the subprime mortgage crisis.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings with respect to this bill at this time.

record.chair: The bill will be placed on the calendar.
